title: AFK
body: Does the error  d3dx9_39.dll count as AFK?

replies.body: If you leave the game for any reason even if not intentional, you can be marked for a leave by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  This error may be a result of a bad driver failing to load, so you should go through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
